TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Transactions extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Provides a way to wrap a callback method within a transaction boundary.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void InvokeTransacted (System.Web.Util.TransactedCallback callback, System.EnterpriseServices.TransactionOption mode);
.method public static hidebysig void InvokeTransacted(class System.Web.Util.TransactedCallback callback, valuetype System.EnterpriseServices.TransactionOption mode) cil managed

Docs.param: The to be run under the specified transaction support.
The that specifies the transaction support for the delegate.
Docs.summary: Wraps a specified transaction support around a callback method.
Docs.exception: The operating system is not Windows NT or later.
The transacted code cannot be executed.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void InvokeTransacted (System.Web.Util.TransactedCallback callback, System.EnterpriseServices.TransactionOption mode, ref bool transactionAborted);

.method public static hidebysig void InvokeTransacted(class System.Web.Util.TransactedCallback callback, valuetype System.EnterpriseServices.TransactionOption mode, bool transactionAborted) cil managed

Docs.param: The to be run under the specified transaction support.
The that specifies the transaction support for the delegate.
The reference parameter that returns if the transaction was aborted during the callback method; otherwise, .
Docs.summary: Wraps a specified transaction support around a callback method and indicates whether the transaction aborted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The `transactionAborted` parameter indicates the result of the transacted callback that you are invoking.

Docs.exception: The operating system is not Windows NT or later.
The transacted code cannot be executed.
